equipment.name: Sovereign Vambraces
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +20.25% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>28.5</text> Essence.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>2</text>.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.43</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Helm
base_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>1.37</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>10</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>30</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Archon Armor
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>0.99%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>59.67%</text>.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.03%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>61.8%</text>.

equipment.name: Chain
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>70.38%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Faulds
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>26.94%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

equipment.name: Dragon Spine
base_affixes: +16% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills
strikethrough_affixes:
<text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> and <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> are also <text class='c_important'>Darkness</text> Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects: 
<li> Enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> take <text class='c_random'>0.68</text> Shadow damage over <text class='c_number'>2</text> seconds. 
<li> <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> creates <text class='c_important'>Desecrated Ground</text> as it travels, dealing <text class='c_random'>10.88</text> Shadow damage over <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>45.91%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes:
Gain <text class='c_random'>36.67%</text> increased damage to a set of damage types for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> seconds.  This effect alternates between <text class='c_number'>2</text> sets: 
<li>Fire, Lightning, and Physical. 
<li>Cold, Poison, and Shadow.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.99%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>59.98%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.
